data.name: Mugen Souls Z - Overwhelming G Fever Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Includes the following DLC packs:

Overwhelming G Fever Pack 1: Includes 100,000,000 G.

Overwhelming G Fever Pack 2: Includes 500,000,000 G.

Overwhelming G Fever Pack 3: Includes 777,777,777 G.

* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.
* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.
* Certain items require other items to be owned before they will appear in the shop.
For further details DLC item conditions, please see the excellent DLC list on the Mugen Souls Wikia page, here: http://mugen-souls.wikia.com/wiki/Mugen_Souls_Z_DLC

data.short_description: Includes the following DLC packs:Overwhelming G Fever Pack 1Overwhelming G Fever Pack 2Overwhelming G Fever Pack 3* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Prosessor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Minne: 4 GB RAM
  • Grafikk: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 512Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Versjon 9.0c
  • Lagring: 4 GB tilgjengelig plass
  • Lydkort: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Anbefalt:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Prosessor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Minne: 4 GB RAM
  • Grafikk: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 1GB RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Versjon 9.0c
  • Lagring: 4 GB tilgjengelig plass
  • Lydkort: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
